parameter.name: objectKey
parameter.description: The name of the object to be deleted.

parameter.name: versionId
parameter.description: Version Id of an object to remove a specific object version.

parameter.name: bypassGovernanceRetention
parameter.description: Indicates whether S3 Object Lock should bypass Governance-mode restrictions to process this operation.

parameter.name: mfa
parameter.description: The concatenation of the authentication device's serial number, a space, and the value that is displayed on your authentication device.

parameter.name: requestPayer
parameter.description: This confirms that the requester knows that they will be charged for the request.
